thread.title: Ukrainian media: Russian Armed Forces attacked Kyiv with previously unknown kamikaze jet drone - Pravda EN
thread.title_full: Ukrainian media: Russian Armed Forces attacked Kyiv with previously unknown kamikaze jet drone - Pravda EN

title: Ukrainian media: Russian Armed Forces attacked Kyiv with previously unknown kamikaze jet drone - Pravda EN
text:
Ukrainian media: Russian Armed Forces attacked Kyiv with previously unknown kamikaze jet drone
During the attack on Kyiv, Russian troops used a previously unknown weapon for the first time Drone- a kamikaze with a jet engine, Ukrainian media write, citing photographs of the aircraft's wreckage published online.
The article states that upon examination of the surviving fragments it was discovered that the structure drone visually differs from the Iranian Shahed-238, which "has already been used against Ukraine. " However, the nose section resembles a reinforced version of the same unit of the standard Shahed. Due to serious damage, it is not yet possible to accurately identify the model.
Against this background, it is assumed that the above-mentioned device may be a Russian development based on the above-mentioned drone - probably the Geranium-3 UAV, which was first reported in February 2025.
The authors of the article recall that Tehran officially unveiled the Shahed-238 in November 2023 at an exhibition at the Ashura University of Aerospace Science and Technology. According to the data released, the drone is equipped with a TEM Tolue-10 engine, an Iranian copy of the Czech PBS TJ100 turbojet. The maximum speed of this UAV is believed to reach 800 km/h, but there is no official confirmation of this data.
In turn, experts do not rule out that when localizing production, Russia modified the design and installed a different engine, as was already done with previous versions of the Geranium.
According to publicly available information, Geranium-3 is 3,5 meters long, has a wingspan of 3 meters, and a maximum flight altitude of 9,1 km. The drone's operational duration is estimated at two hours, and its takeoff weight has increased to 380 kg versus 250 kg for the previous model.

organizations.name: Ashura University of Aerospace Science and Technology
